reviewText:
News channels around the world made it impossible to forget events of October 3, 1993 in Somalia, and to be presented with a historical account from Somalis and Americans provides real insights to the shooting down of the two Black Hawk helicopters, and what followed. There are still many unanswered questions, but this documentary covers a number of important points.

Nicholas R.W. Henning - Australian Author
Cliff Wolcott (mentioned in this documentary and in the hollywood movie) was my second cousin and I am thrilled to have this on DVD.  RIP, Cliff.
